name: Ovide
description:
The colourful world of the Centre Pompidou is only the beginning; climb aboard Ovide and explore dynamically Sonia Delaunay and André Lemonnier's shapes and sounds until you discover the mood you're after...
Team : Damien Chouchen : Developper
Pauline Devolle : Game designer
Swann Menage : Main idea / Sound designer
Mina Perrichon : Lead graphist
Yann Roirand : Main idea / Producer
Vanessa Vautrin : Graphist
Special thanks : Pierre-Marie Blind for helping with dev
Leon Denise for helping with dev
Adrien Neto for lending his laptop
Arthur, Tibo, Clara, Cinthia, the punk girls...
